item.title: John Hancock Hedged Equity & Income Fund Required Notice to Shareholders - Sources of Distribution Under Section 19(a)
item.description: [PR Newswire] - This notice provides shareholders of the John Hancock Hedged Equity & Income Fund (HEQ) with important information concerning the distribution declared on December 1, 2016, and payable on December 30, 2016.
